General.Name: Sharecare Inc
General.Description: Sharecare, Inc. operates as a digital healthcare platform company. Its Sharecare platform connects doctors, health plans, employers, health management tools, information, and others that enable individuals, workforces, and communities to improve their holistic well-being. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia.
General.Address: 255 East Paces Ferry Road NE, Atlanta, GA, United States, 30305
